__e: We were wrong about you the first time.
You and your father have been wrong about a lot of things on this one, Nick.
Would you just say they're wrong about me, please?
You didn't mention this before because...
He convinced me of the error of my ways and told me everything I need to know for this exact purpose.
My family's seats got messed up, and you'd be doing me a huge solid if you'd swap with me.
